text: The 7th Annual Streamy Awards were the seventh installment of the Streamy Awards honoring the best in American web television series and their creators. The awards were held on September 26, 2017 at The Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills, California. The ceremony was hosted by Jon Cozart, presenters and performers at the event included Poppy, Grace Helbig, Tyler Oakley, Swizz Beatz, The Try Guys, Katya Zamolodchikova, Ian Hecox, Mari Takahashi, Niki DeMar, Gabi DeMartino, The Young Turks, LaurDIY, Matt Steffanina, Superfruit, Brittany Furlan, Tommy Lee, Jenna Marbles, Eva Gutowski, AJ Gibson, Laura Marano, Rosanna Pansino, EpicLLOYD, Liza Koshy, Mamrie Hart, and JC Caylen. It was also broadcast live on Twitter. ==Nominees== The nominees were announced in a press release released on August 22, 2017.
